::Aerotaur::
    "Why doesn't anyone listen to me.  Ah well I'm as fast as they are."  He 
turns to horse mode and gallops after them.  He attempts to skid to a halt 
when they collide but nearly fails.  He only succeeded by turning to centaur 
and then bot mode in rapid succession in an attempt to stop.  He uses his 
wings to slow himself until he stops.  "Hello.  I don't believe we've met.  
My name is Aerotaur."
